name: GOJI MAX
short_description:
Eating heavy meals during breakfast, lunch and dinner will slow down metabolism. Moreover, it is more likely for that person to eat in between meals. A better way to eat is to split these 3 meals into smaller portions and spread them out within the day. Spreading the meals 6 times throughout the day would lead to a faster metabolism.
These are only some of the things one should avoid if his/her goal is to lose belly fat in one week. Remember that along with regular exercises and diet, losing fat will be achievable. As always, the personâ€™s determination will decide whether his/her workout would work. The workout and diet plan will be ineffective if the person has no heart to follow it. Discipline might be difficult but the rewards benefited from it would be all worth the pain and hard work. Finally, don allow temptation to interfere. Always stay focus on your goal.
